name: Smart Gecko
description:
You think you're smart in puzzle games? Like challenges in action games? Smart Gecko is a game that combines all this and more, where you must help Tixaz in winning all rooms and prove that it is really very smartKey Features:

  • Action Maze Progressive Puzzle!
  • 50 challenging levels!
  • Joystick, Keyboard or Mouse gameplay!
  • Immersive Soundtrack!
History:

In a research laboratory, one scientist in particular develops an experiment with a gecko, being one of the most agile and clever reptiles in its food chain.

He trains his 'Tixaz' gecko in rooms designed to develop his abilities, and as reward and motivation, he gives him to eat special flies that give more intelligence

Be the gecko, and show us how clever and fun your experience can be in the challenges that will be given to you.
